about_the_game:
What makes MTG unique?

MTG stands apart from all other products available in the market. While most 

motocross games focus on a career-driven narrative, encouraging players to complete a storyline and anticipate the next installment, MTG offers a competitive experience. The most popular and enduring games are those centered around competition

Long-term vision

MTG will operate as a live service game. With this vision in mind, we aim to foster a strong relationship with our customers by rewarding them through a constant flow of challenges as time progresses.

Esports oriented

The game never ends. Motocross The Game is built with esports in mind, offering ongoing competitive seasons, fresh content updates, and new challenges to keep the experience exciting. Whether you're aiming for the top of the leaderboard or looking to hone your skills, there's always something new to master.

Realistic Physics

Experience the thrill of true-to-life motocross riding. Our advanced physics engine and rider dynamics ensure every movement, jump, and turn feels as realistic as possible. From the responsiveness of the throttle to the weight of the bike, every detail is meticulously crafted to make you feel like you're really in control, whether you’re navigating sharp corners or soaring over jumps.

Realistic Tracks

Experience the thrill of authentic motocross, supercross and enduro tracks, crafted with real-world data for unparalleled realism. While our focus is on delivering a true-to-life experience, we've balanced it with gameplay elements to ensure that racing remains challenging, accessible, and—most importantly—fun!

Our renowned track makers have created over 200 replicas in the past 5 years.

The MTG Compound

Motocross The Game stands out with its unique features, including the MTG Compound—a space that truly feels like your own. Play to unlock countless upgrades, showcase your bike collection in your personalized garage, and proudly display your trophies. Expand your garage to achieve a full factory look. And that’s just the beginning... invite your friends to join you on your compound and show off your amazing upgrades!
detailed_description:
Back us on Kickstarter!

Help us achieving our target and beyond, and receive exclusive items available only during the crowdfunding campaign!

Back us now on Kickstarter!

What makes MTG unique?

MTG stands apart from all other products available in the market. While most 

motocross games focus on a career-driven narrative, encouraging players to complete a storyline and anticipate the next installment, MTG offers a competitive experience. The most popular and enduring games are those centered around competition

MTG will operate as a live service game. With this vision in mind, we aim to foster a strong relationship with our customers by rewarding them through a constant flow of challenges as time progresses.

Esports oriented

The game never ends. Motocross The Game is built with esports in mind, offering ongoing competitive seasons, fresh content updates, and new challenges to keep the experience exciting. Whether you're aiming for the top of the leaderboard or looking to hone your skills, there's always something new to master.

Realistic Physics

Experience the thrill of true-to-life motocross riding. Our advanced physics engine and rider dynamics ensure every movement, jump, and turn feels as realistic as possible. From the responsiveness of the throttle to the weight of the bike, every detail is meticulously crafted to make you feel like you're really in control, whether you’re navigating sharp corners or soaring over jumps.

Experience the thrill of authentic motocross, supercross and enduro tracks, crafted with real-world data for unparalleled realism. Our renowned track makers have created over 200 replicas in the past 5 years.

Motocross The Game stands out with its unique features, including the MTG Compound—a space that truly feels like your own. And that’s just the beginning... invite your friends to join you on your compound and show off your amazing upgrades!

name: Motocross The Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bits
  • Processor: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 580 8GB or Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bits
  • Processor: Core i7-12700 or Ryzen 7 7800X3D
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER or Radeon RX 5700 XT or Arc A770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Motocross The Game is the game that gamers have been dreaming of for decades: A hyper-realistic motocross simulator based on online competition, available on both PC and next-gen consoles, with cross-play capabilities.
